synopsis.text: Those who find themselves awake during the clandestine 25th hour, known as the Dark Hour, encounter perilous creatures called Shadows. Fortunately, a select group of individuals possess the ability to wield Persona, a special power to combat these monstrous beings. This secret organization, known as SEES (Specialized Extracurricular Execution Squad), is dedicated to uncovering the truth behind the Dark Hour's emergence. When Makoto Yuuki, a new transfer student, moves into the Iwatodai Dorm, his Persona is activated after an unexpected Shadow attack. Now a member of SEES, Makoto and his teammates must protect humanity from the Shadows and unravel the mystery of the Dark Hour. Based on the 2006 RPG Persona 3, this anime follows the thrilling journey of Makoto and his fellow Persona users as they face their unavoidable destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
